title: Crackling pork belly
description: Ask your butcher to score the skin finely for this as the crackling is essential. The first brief roasting at the higher temperature is essential to set the skin on the route to crispness. These ribs are not sweet and sticky but lightly crisp and lip-tingling.

half a teaspoon dried chilli flakes
a lightly heaped teaspoon Chinese five-spice powder
